para.sentence: Hargrave and Sleeman (1977) give asymptotic approximations for Lamé polynomials and their eigenvalues, including error bounds.
The approximations for Lamé polynomials hold uniformly on the rectangle 0\leq\Re z\leq\!K\!
, when nk and nk^{\prime} assume large real values.
The approximating functions are exponential, trigonometric, and parabolic cylinder functions.
